newsitem.title: UK: BASKETBALL-MEN'S EUROLEAGUE ELIMINATION ROUND RESULTS.
newsitem.headline: BASKETBALL-MEN'S EUROLEAGUE ELIMINATION ROUND RESULTS.

text.p: matches in the men's Euroleague basketball elimination round on
In Istanbul: Efes Pilsen (Turkey) 84, Maccabi Tek Aviv
Villeurbanne - Delaney Rudd 18, Alain Diguebeu 17, Jim Bilba
Estudiantes - Juan Aisa 17, Rafael Vecina 16, Gonzalez
In Zagreb: Cibona Zagreb (Croatia) 61 Olimpija Ljubljana
Cibona - Damir Mulaomerovic 19, Zdravko Radulovic 17, Dzevad
Olimpija: Arriel McDonald 13, Vladimir Stepania 10, Marko
In Milan: Stefanel Milano (Italy) 78 Kinder Bologna (Italy) 76 (40-34).
Stefanel - Anthony Bowie 18, Gregor Fucka 17, Flavio Portaluppi 14
Kinder - Arijan Komazec 25, Alessandro Abbio 16, Zoran Savic 9, Augusto Binelli 9
